list.description: You can create event listener on some event, and add actions on that event. So for example you can send message in chat when someone follows your channel.

variables.userName: Name of the user who triggered the event
variables.userDisplayName: Display name of the user who triggered the event
variables.resubMonths: How many months has the user been subscribed
variables.resubStreak: How many cumulative months has the user been subscribed
variables.commandInput: Parameters of command. Example someone used '!hello world' - and world is parameters there
variables.keywordResponse: Responses of keyword, joined by space
variables.pollOptionsNames: Options of poll, joined by comma
variables.pollWinnerChannelsPointsVotes: Channel points votes of poll winner
variables.pollWinnerTotalVotes: Total votes of poll winner. It includes bits and channel points votes
variables.predictionOptionsNames: Options of prediction, joined by Â· symbol
variables.predictionTotalChannelPoints: Total used channel points for prediction
variables.predictionWinner.title: Title of winner option
variables.predictionWinner.totalUsers: Total users who voted for winner option
variables.predictionWinner.totalPoints: Total used channel points for winner option
variables.predictionWinner.topUsers: Top 10 users who voted for winner option

availableVariablesDescription: You can use custom variables in operations.
onlineOnly: Execute only when stream is online
triggerCommand: Choose command for trigger that event

operations.delay: Delay in seconds before operation executes
operations.repeat: How many times execute that operation

inputDescription.TIMEOUT: Username who will get timeout. Variables supported in that input.
inputDescription.OBS_AUDIO_SET_VOLUME: Volume for setting. Available value is from 0 to 20. If value out of that range will be provided, then that operation wont be fired
inputDescription.OBS_AUDIO_DECREASE_VOLUME: Volume for setting. Available value is from 0 to 20. If value out of that range will be provided, then that operation wont be fired
inputDescription.OBS_AUDIO_INCREASE_VOLUME: Volume for setting. Available value is from 0 to 20. If value out of that range will be provided, then that operation wont be fired
inputDescription.UNVIP_RANDOM_IF_NO_SLOTS: The number of vip slots. If the number of vips equals the number of slots, a random user will lose a vip.
